PROPERTY	cluster01.storage.maxtotalvolumesizeingb	10
PROPERTY	cluster01.storage.maxvolumesizeingb	15

comments.body: Neil commented that there might be a fault for that already in 3.2.  Problem is this is asynchronous, so there is no error message that can propagate from the command with immediate feedback.

This issue was previously scheduled to be worked on in more than one sprint:
* '3.4 Sprint 1' (on board '3.3 Release Board')
* '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Test 3.3 Board')
* '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Copy of 3.3 Release Board')

Starting from JIRA Agile 6.3, an issue can only belong to a single future sprint. Read more about this change: http://docs.atlassian.com/agile/docs-0630/Sprint+Marker+Migration

This issue is now scheduled for future sprint '3.4 Sprint 1' (on board '3.3 Release Board').

If this is incorrect, please update the issue accordingly.

This comment was automatically generated by JIRA. If it is no longer relevant, please feel free to delete it.

The applicable error code for the client would be: ResourceLimitExceeded

This involves a non-trivial change. Is this really 3.4.0 critical? It isn't a regression.

Yeah, this is a significantly involved change. I wouldn't touch it for 3.4.
4.0 is the right candidate in my opinion.
On Sep 16, 2013 5:43 PM, "Zach Hill (JIRA)" <jira@eucalyptus.atlassian.net>
